mapper.sql: MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME, MERCHANT_NAME, MERCHANT_PASSWORD, SALT, USER_TYPE, MERCHANT_TEL_PHONE, MERCHANT_MOBILEPHONE, MERCHANT_BUSINESS_LICENSE, MERCHANT_PHOTO, MERCHANT_ADDRESS, MERCHANT_LONGITUDE, MERCHANT_LATITUDE, MERCHANT_ENABLE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from merchant
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into merchant (MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME, MERCHANT_NAME, MERCHANT_PASSWORD, SALT, USER_TYPE, MERCHANT_TEL_PHONE, MERCHANT_MOBILEPHONE, MERCHANT_BUSINESS_LICENSE, MERCHANT_PHOTO, MERCHANT_ADDRESS, MERCHANT_LONGITUDE, MERCHANT_LATITUDE, MERCHANT_ENABLE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME ) values (#{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantTelPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantMobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{merchantLongitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merchantLatitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{merchantEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )

mapper.update:
update merchant

MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME = #{record.merchantLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MERCHANT_NAME = #{record.merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update merchant set MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME = #{merchantLoginName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_NAME = #{merchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_PASSWORD = #{merchantPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALT = #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USER_TYPE = #{userType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_TEL_PHONE = #{merchantTelPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_MOBILEPHONE = #{merchantMobilephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_BUSINESS_LICENSE = #{merchantBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_PHOTO = #{merchantPhoto,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_ADDRESS = #{merchantAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MERCHANT_LONGITUDE = #{merchantLongitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MERCHANT_LATITUDE = #{merchantLatitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MERCHANT_ENABLE = #{merchantEnable,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT MERCHANT_ID merchantId, MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME merchantLoginName, MERCHANT_NAME merchantName, MERCHANT_PASSWORD merchantPassword, USER_TYPE userType, MERCHANT_TEL_PHONE merchantTelPhone, MERCHANT_MOBILEPHONE merchantMobilephone, MERCHANT_BUSINESS_LICENSE merchantBusinessLicense, MERCHANT_PHOTO merchantPhoto, MERCHANT_ADDRESS merchantAddress, MERCHANT_LONGITUDE merchantLongitude, MERCHANT_LATITUDE merchantLatitude, MERCHANT_ENABLE merchantEnable, CREATE_TIME createTime, LAST_UPDATE_TIME lastUpdateTime FROM MERCHANT WHERE MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME = #{merchantLoginName} AND MERCHANT_ENABLE = '01'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MERCHANT ( MERCHANT_ID, MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME, MERCHANT_NAME, MERCHANT_PASSWORD, USER_TYPE, MERCHANT_TEL_PHONE, MERCHANT_MOBILEPHONE, MERCHANT_BUSINESS_LICENSE, MERCHANT_PHOTO, MERCHANT_ADDRESS, MERCHANT_LONGITUDE, MERCHANT_LATITUDE, MERCHANT_ENABLE, CREATE_TIME, LAST_UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{merchantId}, #{merchantLoginName}, #{merchantName}, #{merchantPassword}, '01', #{merchantTelPhone}, #{merchantMobilephone}, #{merchantBusinessLicense}, #{merchantPhoto}, #{merchantAddress}, #{merchantLongitude}, #{merchantLatitude}, '01', now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT MERCHANT_ID merchantId, MERCHANT_LOGIN_NAME merchantLoginName, MERCHANT_NAME merchantName, USER_TYPE userType, MERCHANT_TEL_PHONE merchantTelPhone, MERCHANT_MOBILEPHONE merchantMobilephone, MERCHANT_BUSINESS_LICENSE merchantBusinessLicense, MERCHANT_PHOTO merchantPhoto, MERCHANT_ADDRESS merchantAddress, MERCHANT_LONGITUDE merchantLongitude, MERCHANT_LATITUDE merchantLatitude, MERCHANT_ENABLE merchantEnable, CREATE_TIME createTime, LAST_UPDATE_TIME lastUpdateTime FROM MERCHANT WHERE MERCHANT_ID = #{merchantId}
